author: Ted
content:
When I first saw this lead image I thought, "Andreas has become a star." I am not even sure why this image excites me so much. In so many ways it is simply... perfect. It is the sort of image that the best street photographers in the world take. When you hit this level in this year's Dreaming Of The City it will be astonishing.

You're working at powerful level now Andreas, I'm proud to know you.
